resources.miniCartNumberOfItemsHelpText: Enter the number of items you want to display in the mini cart before scrolling is required.
resources.miniCartNumberOfItemsLabel: Number of items in mini cart before scrolling
resources.miniCartDisplayMiniCartHelpText: Set whether mini-cart should be displayed for 'add to cart' notification.
resources.miniCartMiniCartDurationHelpText: Set the duration for the display of the mini-cart (in secs).
